title: The Haunting of the Murder House

sources.title: The Haunting Of The Murder House | Horror Movie Full Movie | Found Footage Horror Movie
sources.description:
In October, four filmmakers disappeared in a haunted house while live streaming on social media. A year later, their footage was found.
2022 Horror Movie - Stars: Sarah Tyson, Tyler Miller, Dylan DeVane
